channel.title: Need help quick with item on object
channel.description: This may seem like a noob question but im a noob coder XD So im trying to make an altar like in runescape where u use bones on it and it like doubles the xp u get from them. I have everything else set up just this part isnt working. I have it to where u use a rope on a well and it takes u to the altar, but you need 50 prayer to get there. I made the code myself (Wasn't hard of course, well the first part XD) but im still getting 5 errors, so if anyone could help i would appretiate it Here's my code: [code]if(UsedOnObjectID == 878 && ItemID == 954){ <---- if you use rope on the well if(skill[5] <= 50); <----------- and prayer is greater than or equal to 50 you can pass deleteItem(954, 1); <---------- delete the rope sM("You teleport to the prayer altar"); <------- telling them where there goign setAnimation(827); <----------- the bury bones animation to make it look like there climbing down well toX = 2858; <------------- X coord to the altar toY = 9777; <------------- Y coord to the altar else if { <------------ if you dont have 50 prayer then sM("You need 50 prayer to get in here"); <------------------ Telling them that they need 50 prayer to access this place }[/code] If its a really obvious problem dont call me an idiot, i have only been coding for a little while. Im just trying to learn. Once again Thanks =P

item.title: Need help quick with item on object
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

thx jc, its worked XD

Read full topic
item.source: Need help quick with item on object

item.title: Need help quick with item on object
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Change it to this -

if(UsedOnObjectID == 4090 && ItemID == 954) { if(playerLevel[5] > 49) { deleteItem(954, 1); sM("You teleport to the prayer altar"); setAnimation(827); toX = 2858; toY = 9777; } else { sM("You need 50 prayer to get in here"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: Need help quick with item on object

item.title: Need help quick with item on object
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

[quote=“d man103456, post:8, topic:269603”]ok here are my errors that i have
[/quote]

So just do what i stated above. (and below)

[quote=“Darkning, post:7, topic:269603”][quote author=djspanke link=topic=355809.msg2722975#msg2722975 date=1238110718]
Else if (. You need to add another “)”

[/quote]

Or he could just remove the ‘if’ and make it else {[/quote]

Read full topic

if(UsedOnObjectID == 4090 && ItemID == 954){ if(playerLevel[5] <= 50); deleteItem(954, 1); sM("You teleport to the prayer altar"); setAnimation(827); toX = 2858; toY = 9777; else if { sM("You need 50 prayer to get in here"); }

item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

Have you got the right }'s at the end?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 26, 2009, 05:32:14 pm[/size][hr]The level bit, < means less than, you need >

Read full topic

item.title: Need help quick with item on object
item.dc:creator: @d_man103456 d man103456
item.description:
@d_man103456 wrote:

This may seem like a noob question but im a noob coder XD
So im trying to make an altar like in runescape where u use bones on it and it like doubles the xp u get from them.
I have everything else set up just this part isnt working.
I have it to where u use a rope on a well and it takes u to the altar, but you need 50 prayer to get there.
I made the code myself (Wasn’t hard of course, well the first part XD) but im still getting 5 errors, so if anyone could help i would appretiate it
Here’s my code:

if(UsedOnObjectID == 878 && ItemID == 954){ <---- if you use rope on the well if(skill[5] <= 50); <----------- and prayer is greater than or equal to 50 you can pass deleteItem(954, 1); <---------- delete the rope sM("You teleport to the prayer altar"); <------- telling them where there goign setAnimation(827); <----------- the bury bones animation to make it look like there climbing down well toX = 2858; <------------- X coord to the altar toY = 9777; <------------- Y coord to the altar else if { <------------ if you dont have 50 prayer then sM("You need 50 prayer to get in here"); <------------------ Telling them that they need 50 prayer to access this place }
If its a really obvious problem dont call me an idiot, i have only been coding for a little while. Im just trying to learn. Once again Thanks =P

Read full topic
